title: Train services suspended due to power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 火车服务因电力故障暂停
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api digantung kerana kerosakan kuasa
title_translations.ta: மின்சாரக் கோளாறு காரணமாக ரயில் சேவைகள் இடைநிறுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளன

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Train services have resumed. Free regular and bridging bus services have ended.

[BPLRT] UPDATE: The fault has been rectified. Train service is progreesively returning to normal. Do continue to add 15 mins train travel time. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available at the affected stations.
[BPLRT] Due to a power fault, there will be no train services system-wide. Free regular and bridging bus services are available at all affected stations.
